Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2012 02:24PM - edited Feb 7, 2012 02:27PM by TES71 That sounds like good news but If you are still worried, if you have a family physician I would call them and explain to them whats going on not to scare you but you need to find out and they shouldn't be leaving you hanging like this.My family physician is the one that took care of me and stayed on the ball with it.You also can go to the er as well.
